medical_history.chief_complaint: Undervirilization in 46,XY males with micropenis and related genital anomalies.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms noted at birth; the patients showed inadequate virilization leading to a requirement for testosterone replacement during puberty. Hormonal evaluations indicated low testosterone responses and elevated levels of 17OHP.
medical_history.past_medical_history: All four patients belong to an extended Bedouin family with a history of previous reports of 17,20-lyase deficiency; one patient previously indicated to carry mutations in CYP17A1.
medical_history.family_history: Four affected males from an extended Bedouin family, with maternal cousins.
